name: Event Horizon (itch) (boaz4, alon.eldan, Ash, yonatanp)
description:
=== Story ===

You are the pilot of a commercial interstellar flight.

One of the most impressive sightseeing opportunities during the flight, is when you make a quick pit stop at a Black Hole.

But when things go awry... you might find that your sightseeing pit stop can become quite a lot more than simply a distraction.

Can you use your backup Landing Pod to save everyone,

while they wait for you on the ship?

=== Controls ===

The game is controlled completely with the mouse.

It's a simple point-and-click narrative.

If you'd like, you can even play the game on your mobile phone :)

Good luck!
